title: Dinnerbone：7月29日将放出快照（与Windows10发布日期相同）
author: ufof
txt_content:
We're aiming to get a snapshot out next Wednesday (July 29th). It's not a guarantee, but we're going to try to make it happen. Be prepared!

Dinnerbone：我们计划在7月29日（应该是瑞典时间）放出快照。我们不能完全保证实现，不过希望可以。

Apparently that's the same day as windows 10 comes out. It's completely unrelated. We do snapshots on wednesdays, and this week is too soon.
Dinnerbone：看上去这一天也是Windows 10发布的日期。不过这只是一个巧合。我们一般在星期三放出快照，不过这星期显得太早了。
